items.text: The digital brand standards established for Mercer are applied to all product suites through a style tile. A style tile allows for a visual alignment between approved brand assets and Evolution patterns.
Evolution patterns that are familiar to the user can be branded for a specific product type. Each pattern is designed for reusability and consistency across all Mercer products.
With a full build environment easily available, components can be quickly added to any product suite. Through style tile integration, each component cab be accurately branded.
